details: Apple is the largest technology company by revenue (totaling US$365.8 billion in 2021) and, as of June 2022, is the world's biggest company by market
Xiaomi is an Internet company with smartphones and smart hardware connected by an IoT platform at its core. The company has established the world's largest company by market
Realme is an emerging mobile phone brand which is committed to offering mobile phones with powerful performance, stylish design and sincere services.
